A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible movie. Many useless\, boring subplots that don't develop characters or the universe. Lacks the guts and gravitas of Episode VII.  Does not deserve to be part of the Star Wars cannon. I would say that Episode I was at least entertaining\, this one is just boring. Spoiler warning: it ends characters that everyone likes and loves without any respect\, unlike Episode VII.
